title: dist1 Playful Plaid Picnic Blanket
description:
Blanket is large enough for two! Soft and comfortable 100% polyester 160 GSM fleece material in a beautiful plaid pattern, Water resistant backing, Folds up in a compact easy-to-carry pack with fold-over flap, Large imprint area, Black web handle - Great for travel, car or boat!
Open: 50
